name: The Last Job (msg)
description:
The upcoming Metro Jewelry Exhibit is showcasing rare and priceless artifacts from all over the world. You are called back out of retirement to reclaim something special lost long ago.

Play as a retired, ex-cat burglar in this 3rd person stealth adventure game. Your primary objective is a diamond cane that once belonged to your recently deceased husband and partner in crime. You may not be as agile as you once were, but you've still got some tricks. The exhibit has plenty of other spoils for you as well, but you have to break out of the nursing home first.
